metadata.Title: CVE-2020-1917 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: xbuf_format_converter, used as part of exif_read_data, was appending aterminating null character to the generated string, but was not using itsstandard append char function. As a result, if the buffer was full, itwould result in an out-of-bounds write. This issue affects HHVM versionsprior to 4.56.3, all versions between 4.57.0 and 4.80.1, all versionsbetween 4.81.0 and 4.93.1, and versions 4.94.0, 4.95.0, 4.96.0, 4.97.0,4.98.0.

criterions.comment: hhvm package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
